channel.title: How do I properly add Anti-Null and Anti-Syi to my Server?
channel.description: If it helps I am using devolution 7.0 source, I am pretty sure this cannot just be copied and pasted in. All help appreciated thanks.

item.title: How do I properly add Anti-Null and Anti-Syi to my Server?
item.dc:creator: @Deathspirit Deathspirit
item.description:
@Deathspirit wrote:

[quote=“djdoyle1, post:15, topic:317675”]Add this in your login method

if(UID != yourclientuidhere) { misc.println("[Client Handler]: "+playerName+" Is trying to connect without your client"); disconnected = true; PlayerHandler.kickNick = null; PlayerHandler.kickNick = "null"; } else if(playerName.startsWith("SYI") || playerName.equals(null) || playerName.equals("null")) { PlayerHandler.kickNick = playerName; appendToBanned(playerName); disconnected = true; misc.println(playerName+" Banned"); PlayerHandler.kickNick = null; PlayerHandler.kickNick = "null"; } [/quote]A null is a socket, no playername.

Read full topic

[quote=“The Chubby Bunny, post:16, topic:317675”][quote author=xxlukexx link=topic=414189.msg3051575#msg3051575 date=1260123325]
those codes will still not work.

people can change the name when they null or spam.

public void bannedBitch() {// Coded by Pkman41
	
	if (playerLastConnect.startsWith("xxxxxxxx")) {
		appendToBanned(playerName);
		disconnected = true;
			} else if (playerName.startsWith("SYI")) {
				appendToBanned(playerName);
				disconnected = true;
			}
		
		}

fixed

exactly the same as the other code.
[/quote]
Yeah, but his looked like shit, mines perttier[/quote]

why not stop spamming and post when you actually need to?
they both do the same shit, so why does it matter?

item.source: How do I properly add Anti-Null and Anti-Syi to my Server?

item.title: How do I properly add Anti-Null and Anti-Syi to my Server?
item.dc:creator: @djdoyle1 djdoyle1
item.description:
@djdoyle1 wrote:

Add this in your login method

if(UID != yourclientuidhere) {
misc.println("[Client Handler]: "+playerName+" Is trying to connect without your client");
disconnected = true;
PlayerHandler.kickNick = null;
PlayerHandler.kickNick = "null";
} else if(playerName.startsWith("SYI") || playerName.equals(null) || playerName.equals("null")) {
PlayerHandler.kickNick = playerName;
appendToBanned(playerName);
disconnected = true;
misc.println(playerName+" Banned");
PlayerHandler.kickNick = null;
PlayerHandler.kickNick = "null";
}

Read full topic

item.title: How do I properly add Anti-Null and Anti-Syi to my Server?
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

those codes will still not work.

people can change the name when they null or spam.

[quote=“The Chubby Bunny, post:13, topic:317675”][code]
public void bannedBitch() {// Coded by Pkman41

if (playerLastConnect.startsWith("xxxxxxxx")) {
	appendToBanned(playerName);
	disconnected = true;
		} else if (playerName.startsWith("SYI")) {
			appendToBanned(playerName);
			disconnected = true;
		}
	
	}

[/code]

fixed[/quote]

exactly the same as the other code.

item.title: How do I properly add Anti-Null and Anti-Syi to my Server?
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

[quote=“Pkman411, post:5, topic:317675”]i hav created something really useful and user friendly to get rid of syi… was going to add in a tut but don’t feel like making one… i haven’t got my server online since i added it sos ur gonna have to get the beginning of syi’s ip urself… (if you notice he only changes the last few numbers…) here’s the code

public void bannedbitch() {// Coded by Pkman411 if (playerLastConnect.startsWith("xxxxxxxx")) { appendToBanned(playerName); disconnected = true; } else if (playerName.startsWith("SYI")) { appendToBanned(playerName); disconnected = true; } }

Hope this helps… i assume you know what to do with that and its 4 in the morning so i don’t feel like explaining it… basically get as much of the BEGINNING of his ip as you can without getting to the spot that he changes numbers… add that to area that says xxxxxxxx. and if he tries to login wit the use syi… he get autobanned as well… don’t forget to add to ur login process… peace!

oh and if ur worried bout him spamming ur chat… just change ur yell command to something like shout… helps… he can only spam public for those near him then[/quote]

That’s not going to work. Like any other amateur anti-syi.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I properly add Anti-Null and Anti-Syi to my Server?

item.title: How do I properly add Anti-Null and Anti-Syi to my Server?
item.dc:creator: @Pkman411 Pkman411
item.description:
@Pkman411 wrote:

i hav created something really useful and user friendly to get rid of syi… was going to add in a tut but don’t feel like making one… i haven’t got my server online since i added it sos ur gonna have to get the beginning of syi’s ip urself… (if you notice he only changes the last few numbers…) here’s the code

public void bannedbitch() {// Coded by Pkman411 if (playerLastConnect.startsWith("xxxxxxxx")) { appendToBanned(playerName); disconnected = true; } else if (playerName.startsWith("SYI")) { appendToBanned(playerName); disconnected = true; } }

Hope this helps… i assume you know what to do with that and its 4 in the morning so i don’t feel like explaining it… basically get as much of the BEGINNING of his ip as you can without getting to the spot that he changes numbers… add that to area that says xxxxxxxx. and if he tries to login wit the use syi… he get autobanned as well… don’t forget to add to ur login process… peace!

oh and if ur worried bout him spamming ur chat… just change ur yell command to something like shout… helps… he can only spam public for those near him then

Read full topic
